RemediationStrings.Title: Zscaler version must be 4.4.0.324 or higher. Value discovered was: {ActualValue}.
RemediationStrings.Description: Zscaler version must be 4.4.0.324 or higher. Please contact your Administrator

RemediationStrings.Title: The Zscaler service must be installed
RemediationStrings.Description: Zscaler is not installed or service has failed to install

RemediationStrings.Title: The Zscaler must be running. Current service state is: {ActualValue}.
RemediationStrings.Description: The Zscaler is not in the running state
